attributes.action: make representations to the board of ITV not to cancel The Bill programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Bill is a long-running and nationally popular programme (current viewing figures approx. 3.5m). It is also a major contributor to the employment of people at the Talkback Thames TV production company. Axing the programme will lead to a large number of redundancies at this specialist company as well as being against the wishes of the large numbers of The Bill viewers

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
